parameters.query:
INSERT INTO notification_deliveries (
  notification_id,
  channel,
  provider,
  status,
  provider_message_id,
  provider_response,
  sent_at,
  delivered_at,
  cost_cents
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.notification_id }}',
  'push',
  'mock',
  '{{ $json.status }}',
  '{{ $json.provider_message_id }}',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.provider_response) }}',
  '{{ $json.sent_at }}',
  '{{ $json.delivered_at }}',
  {{ $json.cost_cents }}
)
